org.hps.readout

Class SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.readout.SLICDataReadoutDriver<SimTrackerHit>
          • org.hps.readout.SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SVTTrackerHitReadoutDriver

    public class SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver
extends SLICDataReadoutDriver<SimTrackerHit>
    SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver handles SLIC objects in input Monte Carlo files of type SimTrackerHit.
    See Also:
    SLICDataReadoutDriver

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimTrackerHitReadoutDriver()
      Instantiate an instance of SLICDataReadoutDriver for objects of type SimTrackerHit SimCalorimeterHit and set the appropriate LCIO flags.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Collection<TriggeredLCIOData<?>> getOnTriggerData(double triggerTime)
      Generates a Collection containing any special output data produced by the driver that should be included in triggered output.

      By default, this outputs null.
      protected double getTimeNeededForLocalOutput()
      Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce special on-trigger data.

    • Method Detail

      • getOnTriggerData

        protected Collection<TriggeredLCIOData<?>> getOnTriggerData(double triggerTime)
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Generates a Collection containing any special output data produced by the driver that should be included in triggered output.

        By default, this outputs null. Individual drivers must override the method as needed.
        Overrides:
        getOnTriggerData in class ReadoutDriver
        Parameters:
        triggerTime - - The time at which the trigger occurred.
        Returns:
        Returns a collection containing all special output data.

      • getTimeNeededForLocalOutput

        protected double getTimeNeededForLocalOutput()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce special on-trigger data.
        Overrides:
        getTimeNeededForLocalOutput in class SLICDataReadoutDriver<SimTrackerHit>
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.
